meanings.definition: A person who is excessively active or restless.
meanings.sent1: The hyperactives in the classroom always finish their work quickly.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had to keep an eye on the hyperactives during recess.
meanings.sent3: The hyperactives made the game of tag even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like a whirlwind, a true hyperactives in motion.
meanings.sent5: The hyperactives were like little balls of energy, bouncing around the room.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who exhibit high levels of activity or energy.
meanings.sent1: The hyperactives at the party were dancing non-stop.
meanings.sent2: The hyperactives in the sports team always motivated others.
meanings.sent3: The hyperactives turned the quiet library into a lively gathering.
meanings.sent4: Their enthusiasm was contagious, like a group of hyperactives spreading joy.
meanings.sent5: The hyperactives brought a burst of energy to the event, making it unforgettable.
